pullrequest.title: fix #2600 - remove prepending of additional -l with Boost_PKGCONFIG_LIBS

content.raw:
Sorry, I just meant to adjust the indentation for the few lines of code that had originally been added in 356f459, since your commit used tabs instead of spaces. We aren't completely consistent in our code, sometimes it's 2 spaces, sometimes 4, but it's easier to track changes from a pull request if they don't make large whitespace changes across unrelated parts of the file. So if you can keep lines 374-378 as is and revert the other changes, I would appreciate it.

Thanks again!
